mapper.select: SELECT T1.CART_ITEM_ID , T1.QUANTITY , T1.CART_ID , T2.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID , T2.ITEM_NAME , T2.ITEM_STATUS , T2.ITEM_SUBJECT , T2.PRICE , T2.STOCK , T2.URL_IMG_PATH , T2.POST_YN FROM ( SELECT CART_ITEM_ID , QUANTITY , CART_ID , PRODUCT_ITEM_ID from CART_ITEM WHERE CART_ID = ( SELECT CART_ID FROM CART WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) ) T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID , A.ITEM_NAME , A.PRICE , A.ITEM_STATUS , A.ITEM_SUBJECT , A.STOCK , A.POST_YN , B.URL_IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT_ITEM A INNER JOIN ITEM_IMG B ON A.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID ) T2 ON T1.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID = T2.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID
